FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.
Pendant leurs voyages interminables, les mages de la caravane de Goma Fada ont appris comment apprivoiser la vie et la mort.
Durante sus interminables viajes, los magos de la caravana Goma Fada aprendieron maneras de aprovechar tanto la vida como la muerte.
Während ihrer endlosen Reisen haben die Magier der Karawane aus Goma Fada gelernt, wie man sowohl Tod als auch Leben zügelt.
Nel corso dei loro viaggi senza fine, i maghi della carovana di Goma Fada hanno appreso molte tecniche per imbrigliare tanto la vita quanto la morte.
ゴーマ・ファーダの魔道士たちは、終わり無き旅の中で、生と死の両方を操る術を学んだ。
평생 여행하는 고마 파다 대상단의 마도사들은 삶과 죽음을 뜻대로 부리는 방법을 터득했다.
Во время своих бесконечных странствий маги Гома-Фадского каравана научились обуздывать и жизнь и смерть.
Durante suas viagens intermináveis, os magos da caravana de Goma Fada aprenderam modos de controlar tanto a vida como a morte.

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
La créature équipée a le contact mortel et le lien de vie.
La criatura equipada tiene las habilidades de toque mortal y vínculo vital.
Die ausgerüstete Kreatur hat Todesberührung und Lebensverknüpfung.
La creatura equipaggiata ha legame vitale e tocco letale.
装備しているクリーチャーは接死と絆魂を持つ。
장착된 생물은 치명타와 생명연결 능력을 가진다.
Снаряженное существо имеет Смертельное касание и Цепь жизни.
A criatura equipada tem toque mortífero e vínculo com a vida.
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil and parent:GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_LIFELINK, 1 ) parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_DEATHTOUCH, 1 ) end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) -- AI 'cannot reequip' exemption local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil and EffectController():IsAI() ~= 0 then filter:SetCardInstance(parent) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target_card ~= nil and EffectSource() ~= nil) then EffectSource():Attach( target_card ) end
